actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide for preemption of certain State laws prohibiting or unduly hampering the construction of the Long Beach-Midland project or any crude oil transportation system approved under such title, and for other purposes.
short_title: Crude Oil Transportation Amendments Act of 1979

summary.text: Crude Oil Transportation Amendments Act of 1979 - Amends the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to authorize the President to recommend the waiver of State laws (in addition to Federal laws as currently provided) to expedite the transportation of crude oil. Extends the period for the filing and consideration of applications for proposed crude oil transportation systems.

titles.title: Crude Oil Transportation Amendments Act of 1979

A bill to amend title V of the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to provide for preemption of certain State laws prohibiting or unduly hampering the construction of the Long Beach-Midland project or any crude oil transportation system approved under such title, and for other purposes.
